name: message-verifier
description: Makes it easy to generate and verify messages which are signed to prevent tampering
author: fundon cfddream@gmail.com

scripts.test-ci: babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks test/**/*.test.js
scripts.test-cov: babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter dot --check-leaks test/**/*.test.js
